oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio II: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of program (1 project) concerns integrative control of parasitism in herbivores through a better use of treatments and pastures. It presents tools for controlling anthelmintic use in small ruminants in organic farming from animal to pasture.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Agribio II: Animal husbandry. Runs 2004 - 2007. Programme Leader(s): Cabaret, Jacques.
